1111.content:
You're all younger teenagers and this is your first sleepover where you're allowed to have both girls and boys over. All of the characters are somewhat nerdy and are friends in school. They all like videogames, anime, and action movies, even the girls. Here are you two playable characters-

Seth- Short, tan skin, black hair. Teeny-tiny penis, but he's proud of it despite its size. He's seen small amounts of hentai on the internet and they've corrupted his brain. He thinks the idea of girls in diapers sounds pretty hot. Smartest one of the bunch, but his judgment is easily clouded.

Joey- Taller than Seth, but not by much and very skinny. Blonde hair, pale skin, average sized-penis. He's never been to a sleepover before, much less one with girls, so he's pretty excited about this. He really likes both Ashley and Katie, the two girls at the party. Has played the most videogames of the bunch.
_______________________________

Non Playable (female) characters who are also at the sleepover-

Ashley- The girl who's hosting the sleepover, the whole thing is at her house. She is incontinent and needs to wear diapers at all times. There are plenty of diapers around the house and she is skilled at changing herself, although she likes it better when her friend Katie does it for her. She's a small waifish girl, extremely pale skin, long brown hair, blue eyes. She has small, almost non-existent breasts, but has a round little butt. Normally, Ashley is quite ashamed of her condition and has even been bullied over needing diapers at school before, but she trusts her friends Seth, Joey, and Katie to be nice to her. Wouldn't mind if someone babied her over the weekend. What would make her REALLY happy is if other people wore diapers too so she wouldn't feel alone.

Katie- The "Cool" one of the group. She's a bit taller than Ashley and Seth, tallest of the group in fact, and has dark tanned skin and blonde hair. She's also one of the only girls in school to develop decently sized breasts, although she isn't used to them yet and finds them a little uncomfortable and feels they get in the way sometimes. Ashley asked her before the sleepover if she would wear a diaper, but she's still thinking it over. Hopes to play some silly kissing games with the boys, like spin the bottle, or 7 Minutes in Heaven.

Which main character do you choose?

11113431211211221.content:
So, you had told your friend's mom and sister a while back that, despite being 5 years old, you had wished you could be a baby again. Diapers, pacifiers, cuddling, bottle feedings, breastfeeding, footed onsies, being carried around like a baby, sleeping in a crib, listening to bedtime stories. Granted, you still enjoyed some older kid things like video games and play houses. But most luxuries that babies got now, you missed. Your friend's mom found this completely normal, as did his sister, and they told you it was fine to feel that way. But you had asked them not to tell your friend about it. They were grown ups, so talking to them about this felt okay. But you thought your friend would tease you if he found out. You of course also told your mom, who said the same exact thing as your friend's mom did. Unknown to you, your friend had told your mom, and his mom and sister that he had the same exact secret wish, and like you, didn't want you to know, cause he thought you would tease him for wanting to be babied.

Is this where the story starts, so we can put out some names for the characters and add some detailed description to what they look like? (This will still be second person. But you will respond when your name is called.)

111134312112112211.content:
Okay here's the start of a few ideas for names and looks:

Idea 1:
Chad(You):Chad has blue eyes, brunette hair, and likes a lot of things about space, stars and the planets. He even watches child friendly space exploration movies and shows. He is very small in size for his age. Small enough to look like he's still a baby toddler. This isn't due to neglect or anything. His mother loves and cares about him. He's had trouble with his potty training, and tries best he can, but more often then not, uses the absorbent potty fastened around him, rather then the toilet. His mom does not scold him for it, and comforts him, so he doesn't feel bad he didn't make it. He sort of misses being a baby, without worrying about anything. School being the main thing.

Troy(Your Friend): Amazingly, Troy looks just like you, but with Green eyes. If you and others didn't know any better, you two could be mistaken brothers. Not that you mind. Troy and his family have been like a second family to you. And you've shared the same experiences. You've known each other since you were, well, since you could retain memory. But your moms say you've known each other longer then even you two remember. He's got the same stature as yourself. But while you are into planets and space aliens, he's more for cowboy things. Not that you didn't like cowboys, but it was more his thing, and sometimes you combined the two, not even aware of the movies that were made about it, or the scientist theories that talked that cowboys and aliens could have clashed before. Like you, he wants to get away from many big boy things, video games and classic Disney films are all you two really want that are considered big kid things.

Nancy(Troy's Mom.)Troy's Mom is Brunette like you two, but with blonde highlights, and also has blue eyes. She's 36 years old, but her figure makes her look much younger, like she's only 24. She's got strong toned, motherly build. She also has DDD sized breast. Bigger then your's and Troy's heads, but they fit her figure, and look as if they're supposed to be that big normally. She can carry you both as if you were tiny babies in her arms. Both your weight and Troy's weight were no challenge for her. She stands at 6'3" taller then most men. She loves you as if you were her own son as much as he loves her own kids. And she finds it adorable that you two want to be babied again. And quite frankly, she'd prefer to baby you two. She'd care not if anyone found it odd or not that she was babying two tiny precious boys, still needing their diapers. She's been helping your mom train you and Troy in using the potty, but know the doctors have stated you two will be slow to progress with your bladder control being underdeveloped. She bought a house in a nice open area away from the city, and being a woman of wealth, she has certain things she may be able to do, to let you and Troy live your dream of being babied.

(Note: You can add a twist of Nancy being your real mom later, with a twist to how that is possible. Your original mom is still your real mom, but your friend's mom could also be your other real mom, making you and Troy brothers, in a way you can explain later.)

Grace(Troy's older Sister.):Grace is a blonde haired beauty, and has green eyes like he brother. She's 15 years old, and has taken after her mother with being taller then most kids in her age group, and physique that would definitely ensure men think before they try and make advances at her. She's the very definition of what it means to be an older sister, even to you. She ensures no one makes you or Troy feel outcasted or worthless. She has DD sized breast, which, like her mother, seem normal for her size. She's still got some sprouting to do, but she may rival her mother in height and breast size. She is also aware of your wish, and Troy's wish to be treated like your babies again, and she thinks it's adorable. Like her mom, she can carry you both with ease. And a few times, she has showed her motherly side and babied you both a tad, but not the extent you're both wanting. While she is still young, she has, like her mother become able to lactate. So, if what you and Troy are both wishing comes to fruition, she could breastfeed both of you, if you wish to. But she will not force you to do so.

Do you like this idea to really get the story going. Or should we try another idea to start up the story?

1111343121121122111.content:
You wake up in the morning and what a great day it is! It's not only the first day of your summer vacation but also the day you're going over for a sleepover at your best friend's house.

You get out of bed and head downstairs, with your full diaper sagging and swinging between your legs as you make your way down the stairs. Since you had trouble staying dry during the day it was always a certainty that you would wet your diaper during the night as well. But this is something you've already used to and don't give it much thought.

''Morning little guy, sleep well?'' your mom asks and ruffles your hair as you sit down in the kitchen where a bowl of cereal and some toast is already waiting for you. You begin to eat your breakfast while mom keeps packing up your things for the sleepover. ''Now lets see if I got everything you'll need...'' she says and goes through the stuff. Enough clothes to last the entire week and also a brand new, unopened package of diapers and of course all the changing supplies that are needed.

She drinks her coffee while waiting for you to be done. After you've eaten you get back to your room and hop on your bed and wait for your mom to come and change you out of that soaked night-time diaper you have on. Since it's a daily occurrence in your household you don't really even pay attention to her undoing the diaper, cleaning you up with a few baby wipes and then gently sliding a new diaper under your bottom and then snugly taping it around your waist.

Now, do we fast forward to your arrival at Troy's house?

So, you're mom made sure everything was packed for you. You had made sure to say if you needed a diaper change before going, and also made sure to grab your plush toy Nala. Yeah, you may be a boy, but Nala was your favorite Lion King character. You had soon reached the house, and you and Troy embraced each other in a brotherly hug. Your mom and Nancy had a quick chat with each other, and you weren't sure what was even being said, and they also gave each other a hug, which you didn't think anything of, Troy had already led you into the house, so your attention was diverted after you saw them hugging. Your mom gave Nancy all you things for the sleep over, which to you, was a hug package of things. You also got a hug from Grace, who gave you a kiss on the forehead as well as Troy. You soon got back to the door, and waved to your mom as she took off to take care of thing at your house, which wasn't too far away, but was out in open terrain, away from city life.

Nancy then scooped you up in her arms with your Nala plush. "Well Chad, sweetie. I hope you are excited for this sleepover week, cause I have a surprise for you and Troy," Nancy says.

You arrived at Jake's house by way of your parents. You insisted on getting a ride because you didn't trust yourself not to drive while drunk. As you wave goodbye to your parents, you turn around and get a good look at the house. To your surprise, it's absolutely ginormous. You could've sworn that there were enough rooms for every guy on the team. You knew Jake's family was well off, but this was ridiculous.

Your can already hear the music blaring from all the way on the front lawn. You can already tell that this party was gonna be one to talk about for years. You approach the front door and bang loudly so that they can hear over the music. The party's host, Jake opens it and invites you inside.

"Welcome to the most lit party of the twenty first century" he said with a smile.

You walk in, and immediately, the scent of alcohol invades your nostrils. You see several of your teammates doing shots while the others loudly cheer them on. You decide to...

After hours of dancing you groggily go over to the couch and sit down, when...

Several hours have passed since you finished your last shot. So now that you're mostly coherent, you take notice of a pressure in your bladder. Not wanting to be that one guy that do drunk he pissed himself, you get up and begin to search for the bathroom. Your first instinct was to go and ask Jake where is was, bit as far you could see, he was nowhere to be found. So, your need to urinate growing stronger, you decide to go look for it.

You decide to be a little more risky tonight and go with the two-piece, but first, do you want to the adventure mode?

The Rules For Adventure Mode

At the beginning of every chapter, there will be a bar (X __________ X) that will show Brooke's level of attraction with you. As the bar fills up it's ten spots, it will start to look like this X =====_____ X.

There are ten spots for the bar, to reach max attraction with Brooke, you must get all the way up to ten out of ten. A = sign shows a filled portion of the bar, the example above is halfway full.

Every chapter will have different options, most will affect your standing with Brooke throughout the night, and, where you stand with Brooke also will usually correlate with how cool you're being at the party, meaning a lower score can result in some more humiliating situations.

It's possible to gain or lose more than one part of the bar through a single action.

If you ever get to 0, there will be a punishment.

The game will most likely be easiest in the middle, as going for the gold, and pulling yourself out of a low-spot, can both be fairly hard.

Some decisions will be fairly illogical, but still be the most beneficial for your standing with Brooke, that's just life.

Some routes will only have bad options, some only good, once again, just life

For the best experience, try playing through without going back and redoing options first, before exploring.

The game will automatically end at certain points if you haven't yet reached the top or bottom

You want to go for ten of ten, unless you want to see the protagonist fail, there's no shame in shooting for 0.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----

That's the rules, do you accept them?
